function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of disease through global air travel links","Impact":"Global spread of contagious diseases impacting urban regions","Mitigation":"Enhanced screening and monitoring at airports, travel restrictions, and quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Advanced screening technologies, contactless biometrics, and AI-based monitoring systems","People":"Global travelers, urban populations, airport staff, and public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, airport authorities, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of lockdown and quarantine on global urban lifestyles","Impact":"Disruption of economic activities, social interactions, and mental health of urban populations","Mitigation":"Support for remote work, mental health services, and financial assistance for affected individuals and businesses","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, telemedicine platforms, and online financial support services","People":"Urban populations, business owners, and employees","Owner":"Government agencies, employers, and mental health organizations"}]}
